column2: Sir! Cumbre Vieja has erupted and caused a massive landslide which in turn created the biggest wave ever recorded in human history! Those living in the Canary Islands didn't stand a chance! It is now headed directly towards Europe and North America!
Twisters have wrecked havok in the province and as a result many residents have lost their homes and businesses. The local economy will most likely take a few months to recover.
It is Armageddon! A large asteroid has just crashed into the Earth and wiped out most life on the planet.

A large asteroid has just crashed into the Earth!
It is Armageddon! A large asteroid has just crashed into the Earth and wiped out most life on the planet. Luckily we saw it coming and moved the ruling class of the country to an underground bunker!

A mega tsunami has just hit the shores of North America, Europe and the Caribbeans, millions are feared dead following the disaster.
